definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: Actually, if 35 billion years ago plants had not appeared on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，若無三十五億年前植物在地球上的橫空出世。

sentences.english: Shadow then turned back Xuefei, Yu-off sound of a late winter.
sentences.chinese: 接影橫空背雪飛，聲聲寒出玉關遲。

sentences.english: All six turned out to be cancers that would have been missed.
sentences.chinese: 所有六個橫空出世，已經錯過的癌症。

sentences.english: Still, you can see how China’s new entrepreneurs might begin to emerge.
sentences.chinese: 這樣中國新一代的企業家們看起來是要橫空出世了。

sentences.english: Number of 10 millions of new generation of college students turned out to audience.
sentences.chinese: 數以10萬計的新生代大學生觀衆羣橫空出世。
